page.title: 19LIVING IN GREAT BARR-Nicola
page.content: My name is Nicola Shaw.I live at Dyas Road in Great Barr.I like living here because the shops are good.I like the fish and chip shop because the chips are tasty and the food shop because the people are very pleasant.There is also a doctors about half a mile down the road.There is a lot of bus stops in Great Barr,so we can easily get to places.I also like living here because lots of my friends live here.There are things I do not like about living here,and they are:not enough zebra crossings and not proper paving stones,which you cannot trip on.Most of the people here are nice,but a few people make Great Barr a messy place by throwing litter.I like my school and the people who come here,but sometimes the school gets vandals,and it costs a lot of money to repair.
